name: Escape the paparazzi !
description:
Use your mouse for choosing the player's direction. There are no other controls.

I made this game for the Trijam #152. I took a bit less than 3 hours to create the game, but I spent a bit more time after that to change the graphics and fix errors while building the game.

You can tell me in the comments what your best score is.

You can also take a look at another game that I made.
